protocol.text: We performed a set of quality control checks, i.e. visual inspection of the scans, RNA degradation analysis, examination of the consistency among the replicated samples by principal component analysis, checking the arrays for surface anomalies and inspection of MA plots using a pseudo-median reference and examination of the Affymetrix provided QC values. All 18 arrays passed these tests. ID_REF =  VALUE = The probe level data of the arrays was summarized using the robust multi-array average (RMA) algorithm (Irizarry et al., 2003).

All chemical treatments were performed on 19 to 21-day old plants, grown in soil at 21 C with 70% humidity and a 11/13 h light (100 u E/m2/s)/dark cycle. For E-2-hexenal treatment, 3 plants were placed into airtight glass desiccators (22 L). E-2-hexenal was diluted in methanol and 50 ul of the diluted solutions were applied to a sterile cotton swab, placed in a 50 ml Erlenmeyer flask, positioned among the plants. For the control treatment only methanol was applied.
All experiments were performed with Arabidopsis thaliana plants, ecotype Columbia (Col-0).
RNA was extracted using the TRIzol (Invitrogen) extraction procedure followed by purification on RNAeasy columns (Qiagen).
Labelled cRNA was prepared according to the manufacturer’s instructions (Affymetrix).
Labelled cRNA was hybridized to whole genome Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip, according to the manufacturer’s instructions (Affymetrix)
